article_title: Dave Joyce tours Ashtabula River cleanup

article_metadata.news_keywords: , dave joyce tours ashtabula river clean up
article_metadata.author: SHELLEY TERRY - sterry@starbeacon.comStar Beacon

og.description: It took about $75 million and nearly two decades, but the Ashtabula River is now one of the cleanest and deepest harbors on Lake Erie.
